Reviews.Author: Francesc X. Villalba
Reviews.Content: I decided to buy this tablet after reading a review at Top Notch Tablets, and I am really enjoying it. It's light, impressively quick and has a gourgeous display. It's more than worth its price!
Reviews.Title: A great buy

Reviews.Author: Tamer H.
Reviews.Content: It's lighter than other tablets my family have, impressively quick, battery stays longer and has a gorgeous display.I did not buy the 3G model as I use my phone WI-FI hot spot function to access 3G network. I only wish PIPO creates a better support site and update service, the existing one "just" work for me but do need improvement.In short, I am a very happy customer.
Reviews.Title: More than what I expected :-)

Reviews.Author: Sherman McFarland
Reviews.Content: My wife set it up, before Christmas and began using it. She loves the speed and power.I highly recommend it.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
